primary.request: Get a 2025 receipt for tax reasons
primary.context: Customer needs payment history for tax purposes
primary.detail: Agent sent the maintenance account history link to the verified email, but the caller disconnected while checking their inbox, expressing frustration.

steps: AI attempted transfer, but queue was unavailable after a long wait.
Caller then requested a 2025 receipt for tax purposes.
AI performed account lookup via phone number and verified the email on file.
AI sent the maintenance account history link to the customer's email.
Caller abandoned the call while checking their inbox.

impediment.detail: The initial transfer request failed due to no agents being available after a 5-minute wait, forcing the caller back to the AI.

clarifications.note: CallerID lookup failed to return valid contracts

actions.detail: Transfer to concierge failed due to agent unavailability
Initial callerID lookup failed; manual phone entry succeeded
Sent maintenance account history link to verified email

insights.summary: The caller initially wanted a human but was forced back to the AI after a 5-minute queue wait. The AI successfully identified the account and sent a payment history link for tax purposes, but the caller hung up in frustration while checking their email.
insights.verbatim: Are you it's the same fucking thing. It's the same. Why do you keep
